Assumption: Conservative: 1% forecast improvement, 2M meters, coal-heavy grid (0.6 kg/kWh)
Notes: Assumes only 40% adoption rate, minimal grid improvements

Assumption: Realistic: 3% forecast improvement, 5M meters, mixed grid (0.4 kg/kWh)
Notes: Main scenario used in submission, US average grid

Assumption: Optimistic: 5% forecast improvement, 10M meters, renewable-heavy grid (0.2 kg/kWh)
Notes: Best case with high renewable penetration and full adoption
